review: What an amazing little device this Amazon  Fire TV is! It is so user friendly and stocked with so much entertainment; ie. video, audio, movies, TV shows and even all of your downloaded pictures  (free storage ) that it almost defies one's imagination. The video and audio are almost of movie theater  quality. It is simple to install (even for a technophobe).It has a remote selection device that seamlessly responds to your voice. It is so enjoyable that we just purchased another one for another TV.The only slight improvement  I would suggest is to increase the selection of free  movies and TV shows. If amazon did that, they could conquer the world! Thanks, Steve G.
